data.title: ChatGPT-Maker OpenAI's Future Hangs In The Balance As Judge Says Elon Musk's Lawsuit Will Partially Go To Trial
data.description: A federal judge ruled that parts of Elon Musk's lawsuit against OpenAI will proceed to trial, with Musk required to testify, as he seeks to block the AI company's transition to a for-profit model, which he argues contradicts its original mission.

data.title: Mark Zuckerberg Once Told Sam Altman That The Most Painful Moment In His Life Was Not Rejecting A $1 Billion Buyout Offer For Facebook But Losing An Entire Team — Here's Why
data.description: Mark Zuckerberg revealed to Sam Altman that the most painful moment in Facebook's early days wasn't rejecting a billion-dollar offer, but watching his entire management team quit because they didn't believe in his vision for the company's future.

data.title: Cathie Wood-Led Ark Invest Dumps $7M Worth Of Palantir Stock Amid Searing Rally
data.description: On Tuesday, Feb. 4, 2025, Cathie Wood-led Ark Invest dumped $7.4 million worth of Palantir stock even as the shares rose 24% over 24-hours.

data.title: Trump Says US Will Take Over Gaza Strip: 'We're Going To Develop It, Create Thousands Of Jobs'
data.description: Trump announced on Tuesday that the U.S. will assume control of Gaza, clear unexploded bombs, and economically develop the region.

data.title: Elon Musk Is 'All-In' On Trump – Tesla Investors Holding 600,000+ Shares Question If He Can Still Run A $1.25 Trillion Company
